value.title: Normalizing data: The what, why and how
value.excerpt: Normalizing data in Power BI: The what, why and how  When analyzing data by population, plotting the row data against the geographical location will fail to reveal important patterns when comparing countries with big differences in population and this is when it is useful to normalize the data. value.excerpt: As we all know, Power BI table visualization does not support HTML generation. So, we need to convert our HTML text to Plain text.
